message.content:
I need to identify the value of cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of the period from the cash flow statement.

Looking at the cash flow statement provided, I can see the section labeled "Cash and Cash Equivalents" which contains three line items:
- Beginning Balance
- Ending Balance
- Net Increase

The "Beginning Balance" line item represents the cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of the period, which is the value I need to extract.

In this case, the value shown next to "Beginning Balance" is 20000000.00.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '20000000.00'} }
```
